subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: SALT LAKE CITY, Sept. 15 (AP) — Tommy Grady threw three touchdown passes, Darrell Mack ran for 107 yards and Utah capitalized on a long list of mistakes by No. 11 U.C.L.A. in a 44-6 upset of the Bruins on Saturday.
snippet: SALT LAKE CITY, Sept. 15 (AP) — Tommy Grady threw three touchdown passes, Darrell Mack ran for 107 yards and Utah capitalized on a long list of mistakes by No. 11 U.C.L.A. in a 44-6 upset of the Bruins on Saturday.
